Title: Provides for distinctive plates for gold star families
Summary: Provides for distinctive plates for gold star families, including gold star parents, as defined in 10 USC 1126, or children of a gold star parent, and their spouses.
LawCode: Amd ยง404-i, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to providing for distinctive plates for gold star families
